item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Ok I forgot where to add these sorts of codes im using dodian.

if(absY <= 3520 && absY >= 3520 && absX <= 3240 && absX >= 3248)
{
inCombat();
}
else
{
sendMessage(“You can only attack players in the designated PK area!”);
}
